content: single_crochet at the placing single_crochet in each sts until you beg of the row cut your yarn and reach the 2nd cup do the exact weave ends same instructions 7 | pag e your top is done thank you so much for the support by purchasing this pattern if you have any questions or confused on a certain part of the pattern please do not hesitate to email me at handcraftedbyroo@gmail com don t forget to tag me in your finished top and use the hashtag #janarabrallete  -------------------------- please note that this copy of the pattern is for personal use only and not for redistribution or sale the finished items made using this pattern can be sold or distributed however i ask for it to be recognized as handcraftedbyro design thank you so much gwapa beautiful all the love ro  8 | pag e
